#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef pair<int,int> ii;

int dp[105][2405],test;
ii a[105];

bool comp(ii x,ii y)
 {
     return x.second < y.second;
 }

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	cin>>test;
	int num = 0;
	while(test--)
	 {
	     num++;
	     int n=0,tn;
	     cin>>tn;
	     
	     for(int i=1;i<=tn;i++)
	          cin>>a[i].first;
	     
	     for(int i=1;i<=tn;i++)
	     {
	          cin>>a[i].second; 
	          if(a[i].second >= 0)
	            n++;
	          a[i].second -= 30;
	     }
	     
	     
	     if(n == 0)
	      {
	          printf("Case %d: 0\n",num);
	          continue;
	      }
	      
	      sort(a+1,a+tn+1,comp);
	      
	      for(int i=1,j=tn-n+1;i<=n;i++,j++)
	       {
	           a[i] = a[j];
	           //cout<<a[i].second<<endl;
	       }
	       
	       int mc = a[n].second;
	       
	       for(int i=0;i<a[1].first;i++)
	        dp[1][i] = 0;
	       
	       for(int i=a[1].first;i<=mc;i++)
	        dp[1][i] = 1;
	        
	       for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
	        {
	            for(int j=1;j<=mc;j++)
	             {
	                 if(a[i-1].second < 1)
	                 {
	                  dp[i][j] = 0;
	                 // cout<<dp[i][j]<<" ";
	                  continue;
	                 }
	                 else
	                  dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][min(j,a[i-1].second)];
	                  
	                 if(j-a[i].first >= 1)
	                  {
	                    dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j],1 + dp[i-1][min(j-a[i].first,a[i-1].second)]);   
	                  }
	                  
	                 // cout<<dp[i][j]<<" ";
	                  
	             }
	            // cout<<endl;
	        }
	        
            printf("Case %d: %d\n",num,n-dp[n][mc]);
	        //cout<<n-dp[n][mc]<<endl;
	       
	 }
	
	return 0;
}
